text:
@GovMurphy We could easily change that by changing the parameters and recruiting some good statisticians.  
After all, that's how we got our #Covid19 numbers.

Stop pretending that we can't protect the vulnerable  without resorting to gov't overreach. 
#NJ deserves better. Freedom matters
